EmailTemplate.description: Email Template used when forwarding a SupplyWin Quote to CSSC.
EmailTemplate.name: Forward SupplyWinQuote
EmailTemplate.subject: SupplyWin Quote Attached ({!Case.Subject})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Please complete the attached SupplyWin Quote:.
Plant: Ship To: YO:
For questions please contact {!Case.OwnerFullName} and reference case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thanks!
